content: Decide if the word 'there','their', or 'they're' was used correctly. It does not matter if it was spelled wrong, usage matters. Respond with Correct or Incorrect.
There is a cool dog next to you.
Correct. Right spelling and correct usage.
Incorrect. Right spelling but incorrect usage.
Correct. Right spelling and correct usage.
Correct. Wrong spelling but correct usage.
They'ree a nice boat in the Cheaspeake bay
Correct. Wrong spelling and Incorrect usage.
That was cool their car exploded into tiny particles
Correct. Right spelling and correct usage.
